text: The Academy of the Hebrew Language (, HaAkademya laLashon ha'Ivrit) is the main institution of the Hebrew language. The academy was started in 1890 as the "Hebrew Language Committee" in Jerusalem. In 1953 it was replaced by the "Academy of the Hebrew Language" that was established in the Hebrew University of Jerusalem on the Givat Ram campus. == Other websites == * Category:Language regulators Category:Hebrew language Category:Buildings and structures in Jerusalem Category:Educational organizations Category:Organizations based in Jerusalem
title: Academy of the Hebrew Language
